summary: This Is My Second Mod, So Do Not hate Please :).  This Mod Adds A New Companion to The Game. Located At The Ragged Flagon At Riften Sewers. Read More inside.
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Desc. And Info About This Mod

- Adds A New Companion. Khajiiti. Duel Daggers Wielder.
- Located At - The Ragged Flagon At Riften Sewers.
- This is My Second Mod So Please Do Not Hate :)

Mod Requirements

- None

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Info About Future Mods

- I will Be making Companion Mods, So If U Like These Things Make Sure U Add Me :)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

info about Other/Permissions

- I Allow Mod Reviews. Just Comment In The Comments The Link :)
- I Do Not Give Permission To Copy This Mod. yet I Do Allow translations.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
